titleInfo.title: Martha White's Midnight Gospel Singing with the LeFevres at the Patton St. Armory

mods.abstract: Two color window card (blue and red on white) announcing Martha White's Mid-Night Gospel Singing concert with the Singing Speers Family, the LeFevre Trio at the Patton Street Armory on November 17. Poster features metal photoplates of the Speers Family, the LeFevre Family and advertisements for Martha White Flour.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
